title: WTB: T207 H Metz Stamps in REA
author: eliotdeutsch

posts.post_title: WTB: T207 H Metz Stamps in REA
posts.post_content:
A bunch of these sold a few years back on eBay. 
Anyone have any? 

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1112&pictureid=27985[/IMG]
Did anyone win the 98 card T207 lot? There were some H Metz stamps in there that I’d be interested in. Can swap for unstamped ones.

I have a t205 Murphy with a metz stamp on the back.  If that is something you're interested in,  I'm sure we could work out a trade. I like it, and wasn't considering getting rid of it, but far be it for me to get in the way of a back stamp collector.[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20200508/5cc3cab3cedcd9f33822da10262f470d.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my SM-G970U using Tapatalk
Thank you!! Still looking for those T207s from REA.
